entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Current Conditions: 8.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Qualicum Beach Airport 2:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: 8.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 92 %
Dewpoint: 7.2°C
Wind: ESE 24 km/h gust 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches dissipating early this afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 early this afternoon. High 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers at times heavy. Temperature steady near 7.
entry.summary: A few showers changing to rain at times heavy near midnight. Amount 15 mm except 30 mm between Qualicum Beach and Fanny Bay. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. Amount 10 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light near noon. High 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
